values: 正确的；准确的；恰当的；合适的；正当的；公正的；右边的；右侧的；右手的；右翼的；保守派的
正确地；恰当地；正好；径直；直接地；立即；马上；彻底地；完全地；确实；向右边；在右面；恰恰；正是；适时地；恰到好处地
权利；版权；正义；公正；正确性；道理；理由；正当理由；正当要求；特权；优先权；右边；右侧；右手拳；右部；右翼；右派
纠正；矫正；补偿；使回到正常位置；使恢复正常位置；扶正；使…直立；为…平反；调整；改正；修复错误；恢复平衡；校准；向右
对；是的；正确；好哇；没错；行；可以；是吗；对不；就这样；就这么定了；那就这样吧；（引起注意）嗨；喂

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 合法的；正当的；公正的；正直的
正确地；恰当地；公正地；合适地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指特许或恩施的权利，也指一般人或物所没有的有利条件。
普通用词，指某人或某物拥有符合法律、道义或道德的权利。
最常用词，主要指按一定标准或规则来衡量，没有谬误和差错或无缺点错误。
指通过谨慎的努力达到符合事实或实际，侧重不同程度的准确性，与事实无出入。
着重在质与量方面的准确，语气比accurate强。
暗指绝对准确，尤指复制品与原件丝毫不差。
使用广泛，可与这些词中的correct换用，但常暗示道德、理解、行动等方面的正确。
侧重极端准确，更强调细节的精确无误。

word_group.brief_definition: 现在, 立刻, 马上
满意的, 良好的；对, 是的；好吧
在恰当的时间；在对的时间
右手；得力助手；右方；右面；右手上座；不可或缺的助手；最显赫的（尤指王室）家族分支；第二显赫的（尤指王室）家族分支
表决权利；投票权；选举权
民事权利；民法权利；公民权利

bilingual.source: I'm going to find the right leaf!
Eat the right food and be healthy.
bilingual.target: 吃正确的食物并保持健康。

bilingual.source: He knows how to choose the right colour!
bilingual.target: 他知道如何选择正确的颜色！

bilingual.source: Match the pictures to the right caption.
bilingual.target: 将图片与正确的标题匹配。

bilingual.source: Always act according to what you know is right.
bilingual.target: 总是按照你知道的正确的事情去做。

bilingual.source: We did the right thing at the right time.
bilingual.target: 我们在正确的时候做了正确的事。
你的答案是完全正确的。

list.abstract: right（英[raɪt]，美[raɪt]），英语单词，作形容词为端正的；正当的；正义的。作副词为完全地；彻底地；正确地。作名词为正当；正义；公正。作动词为使恢复正常位置；将… 扶正；纠正。短语搭配有right now（现在，立刻，马上）。例句为“Charlie raised his right hand and repeated the oath loudly. （查理举起右手，大声地重复着誓言）”。 right做形容词时近义词有immediate、true等，相关反义词有left、wrong等。

yingyinNormal.en: Jack, you're doing the right thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克，你做了正确的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. I mean, I know I did the right thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我知道我的决定是正确的。

yingyinNormal.en: Monica, what should I do? Just do the right thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫妮卡，我该怎么办？做正确的事就行了。

yingyinNormal.en: I agree she should die. But in the right way. At the right time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我同意她必须死，但要正确的方式，正确的时刻。

yingyinNormal.en: And we helped you make all of the right decisions, except for this one! Raised you right!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们也帮助你做出每一个正确的决定，除了现在这一个！好好地抚养长大！

yingyinNormal.en: And you're gonna pay back. But, but... Because that's right. You're gonna do the right thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得还我人情，可是，可…因为那才是正确的，你要做正确的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Honestly, lucky. Most astronauts have to train their whole lives. I was just in the right place at the right time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说实话，感觉很幸运。大多数宇航员必须训练一辈子的时间。我只是在正确的时间到了正确的地点。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't try to get in on that. I did the right thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你少邀功，是我做了正确的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: How can you be sure you're growing in the right way?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么能确定你在往正确的方向成长呢？

yingyinNormal.en: No matter what we decide, this is our world and it's only the right decision if we stay friends. We can control that, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不管我们的决定是什么，这是我们的世界，只要我们还是朋友，就是正确的决定，我们可以掌控的，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: You have to understand I did it for the right reasons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须明白我这么做是出于正确的理由。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you did the right thing last night. I was a mess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你昨晚的做法是正确的，我当时脑子不清楚。

yingyinNormal.en: And you know what? Sometimes you just got to do the right thing. Okay? You got to do the right thing, even if it's not what you want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且你知道吗？有时候你必须做出正确的选择。好吗?你必须做正确的事，哪怕这不是你真正想要的。

yingyinNormal.en: I said open the door. Let me out. It's the right thing to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说了开门，让我出去。合作才是正确的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh is right. We need a new captain. I thinks it should be Oh!
yingyinNormal.zh: 哎呀是正确的，我们需要一个新的船长。我觉得应该让小欧来当。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, we want to wait, right? Right. Right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我们要等，对吧？对。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, get in. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，上车吧。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Right? I know. Okay. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道…

yingyinNormal.en: Right, right. You can always say "No".
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，你可以随时说退出。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you hit it! All right. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还不出手。好的，好的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 右边; 右边的; 在右边
(in one's own right)凭借自身力量
右派组织(或政党); 右翼
正常; 情况良好的; 顺利

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 正确地；准确地；理所当然；公正地；正当地

word_family.mean: adj. 端正的；正当的；正义的；理所当然的；正确的；对的；准确的；右边的；右肢体的；右肢体穿戴的；十足的；绝对的；支持保守观点的；右翼的；右派的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 凭自身的条件；凭自身的力量
表决权利；投票权；选举权
民事权利；民法权利；公民权利

examination_example.sentence: Broadband providers' <highlight>rights</highlight> should be protected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宽带供应商的权利应该受到保护。

examination_example.sentence: It also pledged not to deploy AI whose use would violate international laws or human <highlight>rights</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还承诺不会部署违反国际法或人权的人工智能。

examination_example.sentence: In France, shareholders who hold onto a company investment for at least two years can sometimes earn more voting <highlight>rights</highlight> in a company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在法国，持有公司投资至少两年的股东有时可以获得更多的公司投票权。

sense_info_list.en: true or correct as a fact; correct in your opinion or judgement; morally good or acceptable; what is correct according to law or a person's duty

examination_example.sentence: Most of its terrain doesn't have the <highlight>right</highlight> soil or climate to grow crops on a commercial basis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的大部分地形都没有合适的土壤或气候来种植商业作物。

examination_example.sentence: It is hard to get <highlight>right</highlight>, and requires a remarkable degree of vision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个做法很难达到正确，需要非凡的远见。

examination_example.sentence: The Times shouldn't waste time getting out of the print business, but only if they go about doing it the <highlight>right</highlight> way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《纽约时报》不应该把时间浪费在退出印刷业上，但前提是他们的做法是正确的。

sense_info_list.zh: 右边; 右边的; 在右边

examination_example.sentence: The lingua franca of corporate America has gotten much more emotional and much more <highlight>right</highlight>-brained than it was 20 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与20年前相比，美国公司的通用语也变得更加情绪化，更加右脑化。

examination_example.sentence: Answer the questions by finding information from the left column that corresponds to each of the marked details given in the <highlight>right</highlight> column.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过从左栏中找到与右栏中给出的每个标记细节相对应的信息来回答问题。

examination_example.sentence: There are two extra choices in the <highlight>right</highlight> column.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 右边一栏有两个额外的选项。

sense_info_list.zh: (in one's own right)凭借自身力量

examination_example.sentence: His tale of self-improvement and hard work would make a fascinating biography in its own <highlight>right</highlight>, but represents something more than that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他关于自我提升和努力工作的故事本身就是一部引人入胜的传记，但它的意义远不止于此。

examination_example.sentence: The book's title has become a buzzword in its own <highlight>right</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这本书的标题凭借自身就成为了一个流行词。

sense_info_list.zh: 右派组织(或政党); 右翼

examination_example.sentence: Avoiding this rather than promoting it should unite the left and <highlight>right</highlight> of the political spectrum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 避免这一点而不是促进这一点，应该团结政治领域的左翼和右翼。

examination_example.sentence: And yet, it would be a mistake to think we are <highlight>right</highlight> now simply experiencing the painful side of a boom and bust cycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果认为我们现在只是在经历繁荣与萧条周期的痛苦一面，那就错了。

examination_example.sentence: But you'll reap benefits such as less anxiety and improved sleep <highlight>right</highlight> away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但你会马上收获一些好处，比如减少焦虑和改善睡眠。

sense_info_list.en: in a satisfactory, sound, or normal state or condition
sense_info_list.zh: 正常; 情况良好的; 顺利

sense_info_list.en: what is considered to be morally good or acceptable

word_usage.usage: 表示“正确的，恰当的”时，correct较right正式，较常用以指方法，right则较常用以指看法、意见和决定。
表达“对.....的意见或判断是准确的、恰当的”可以说right about sth./right to do sth.以及right in doing sth.。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 正好; 恰好; 直接地
状态良好的; 不错的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 正确地；准确地；理所当然；公正地；正当地
adj. 正直的；公正的；极好的；绝好的；真的；道德高尚的；这么说不错的
adj. 对财产享有合法权利的；合适的；正当的；恰当的
满意的, 良好的；对, 是的；好吧

word_family.mean: adj. 端正的；正当的；正义的；理所当然的；正确的；对的；准确的；右边的；右肢体的；右肢体穿戴的；十足的；绝对的；支持保守观点的；右翼的；右派的

sense_info_list.en: following or in accordance with what is just, good, or proper

examination_example.sentence: I sincerely hope that those who assert that automation will make us more effective and pave the way for new occupations are <highlight>right</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真诚地希望那些断言自动化将使我们更加高效并为新职业铺平道路的人是正确的。

examination_example.sentence: They also hold employees accountable for their behaviors and are genuinely committed to doing the <highlight>right</highlight> thing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们还要求员工对自己的行为负责，并真诚地致力于做正确的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Am I <highlight>right</highlight> in saying you can divide what you do into two distinct methods, simultaneous and consecutive interpreting?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我说的对吗？你可以把你的工作分成两种不同的方法，同声传译和交替传译？

examination_example.sentence: It helps to protect one's intellectual property <highlight>rights</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于保护自己的知识产权。

examination_example.sentence: It infringes on intellectual property <highlight>rights</highlight> of others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它侵犯了他人的知识产权。

examination_example.sentence: Recreating a deceased famous actor or actress may violate their legitimate <highlight>rights</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重新塑造已故的著名演员可能会侵犯他们的合法权利。

sense_info_list.en: suitable or correct, or as it should be

examination_example.sentence: Acknowledging this in an interview will largely suggest that you might be the <highlight>right</highlight> person for the position you are applying for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在面试中承认这一点将在很大程度上表明你可能是你所申请的职位的合适人选。

examination_example.sentence: Don't say that you've moved around in jobs because you haven't found the <highlight>right</highlight> fit or feel that you were not challenged enough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要说你换工作是因为你没有找到合适的工作，或者觉得你没有受到足够的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: So if you want to compliment someone on the work they have done and imitate it, just make sure you do it the <highlight>right</highlight> way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，如果你想称赞别人的工作并模仿他们，只要确保你用正确的方式去做就行了。

sense_info_list.zh: 正好; 恰好; 直接地

examination_example.sentence: To make things worse, I managed to fall <highlight>right</highlight> in front of four girls from the ninth grade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更糟糕的是，我竟然当着四个九年级女生的面摔倒了。

examination_example.sentence: What should parents do <highlight>right</highlight> after watching the TV program?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母看完电视节目后应该做什么？

sense_info_list.en: in a satisfactory, sound, or normal state or condition
sense_info_list.zh: 状态良好的; 不错的

word_usage.usage: 做某事是正确的，可用be right in doing sth.表达。如：我想我说这话没错。I think I'm right in saying this.
right与动词连用时，须放在动词之后；与其他副词连用时，须放在其他副词之前。
right作名词表示“右边”时，多用介词on或to。on the right强调空间位置，表示“在右边”；to the right强调方向，表示“向右边”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 对财产享有合法权利的；合适的；正当的；恰当的

word_family.mean: adj. 端正的；正当的；正义的；理所当然的；正确的；对的；准确的；右边的；右肢体的；右肢体穿戴的；十足的；绝对的；支持保守观点的；右翼的；右派的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 满意的；良好的；对；是的；好吧

sense_info_list.en: following or in accordance with what is just; good; or proper

examination_example.sentence: If you work for a boss who doesn't trust their employees to do <highlight>right</highlight>, you'll have a miserable time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你为一个不相信他们的员工能做好的老板工作，那你的日子就不好过了。

examination_example.sentence: Those assumptions lead us to the perception that people in poverty are lazy, they don't care, and they haven't made the <highlight>right</highlight> decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些假设让我们认为穷人很懒，他们不在乎，他们没有做出正确的决定。

examination_example.sentence: Do you have the <highlight>right</highlight> combination of subjects and are your expected grades likely to meet entry requirements?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的学科组合是否正确？你的预期成绩是否符合入学要求？

sense_info_list.en: suitable or correct; or as it should be

examination_example.sentence: Does that sound about <highlight>right</highlight> to you?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你觉得这样合适吗？

examination_example.sentence: That sounds about <highlight>right</highlight> then.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这听起来差不多是适当的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Right</highlight>, you've convinced me. I'm going to go on the computer now and give it a try.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的，你说服我了。我现在要打开电脑试一试。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Right</highlight>, of course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的，当然了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Right</highlight>, but do you know there is no speed limits in Germany?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的，但是你知道德国没有限速吗。

examination_example.sentence: They are the ones who, <highlight>right</highlight> in the middle of a critical meeting, are expected to instantly fix the projector that's not working.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们是那些在关键会议进行时应该立即修复损坏的投影仪的人。

examination_example.sentence: As schools have changed in the past century, the midday meal container has evolved <highlight>right</highlight> along with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着上个世纪学校的变化，午餐盒也随之发展。

examination_example.sentence: Fast food chains in New York City has started to obey a rule requiring them to post calorie counts <highlight>right</highlight> on the menu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽约市的快餐连锁店已经开始遵守一项规定，即要求他们在菜单上标明卡路里含量。

examination_example.sentence: Let's order Vietnamese <highlight>right</highlight> away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们马上点越南菜吧。

examination_example.sentence: She returned it to its owner <highlight>right</highlight> away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她马上把它还给了主人。

examination_example.sentence: They grabbed the phone and called back <highlight>right</highlight> away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们抓起电话，立即回了电话。

word_usage.usage: right与动词连用时，须放在动词之后；与其他副词连用时，须放在其他副词之前。
right作名词表示“右边”时，多用介词on或to。on the right强调空间位置，表示“在右边”；to the right强调方向，表示“向右边”。
做某事是正确的，可用be right in doing sth.表达。如：我想我说这话没错。I think I'm right in saying this.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 正当; 正义; 正确

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 满意的；良好的；对；是的；好吧

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: 满意的, 良好的；对, 是的；好吧

word_family.mean: adj. 端正的；正当的；正义的；理所当然的；正确的；对的；准确的；右边的；右肢体的；右肢体穿戴的；十足的；绝对的；支持保守观点的；右翼的；右派的

examination_example.sentence: You keep hearing about recycling, <highlight>right</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你一直听说回收，对吗？

examination_example.sentence: Emotional intelligence, with its focus on both head and heart, may serve to point us in the <highlight>right</highlight> direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情商既关注头脑，也关注内心，可能会为我们指明正确的方向。

examination_example.sentence: Have everyone put their clothes in the <highlight>right</highlight> spots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让每个人把衣服放在正确的位置。

examination_example.sentence: But Bonds doesn't believe a robot is <highlight>right</highlight> for the job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是邦兹认为机器人不适合这项工作。

examination_example.sentence: You need a seat which supports your back and the book should be at the <highlight>right</highlight> distance from your eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要一个能支撑你背部的座位，书本应与你的眼睛保持适当距离。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>right</highlight> level of background noise may interrupt our normal patterns of thinking just enough to allow our imaginations to wander.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 适当水平的背景噪音可能会干扰我们正常的思维模式，足以让我们的想象力游荡。

examination_example.sentence: I always liked drawing as early as I can remember, so <highlight>right</highlight> from then, I knew what I was going to be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从我记事起，我就一直喜欢画画，所以从那时起，我就知道我会成为什么样的人。

examination_example.sentence: What does Frank plan to do <highlight>right</highlight> after graduation?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弗兰克毕业后打算做什么？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Right</highlight> now, the answer is: not very easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，答案是：不太容易。

examination_example.sentence: Well, it takes a while to get it <highlight>right</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，需要一段时间才能把他弄好。

examination_example.sentence: Something's not <highlight>right</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有点不对劲！

examination_example.sentence: Just before September, Miller was struck by a car and lost his <highlight>right</highlight> arm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在9月前，米勒被一辆汽车撞了，失去了右臂。

examination_example.sentence: I placed it centrally to take the view from the foreground <highlight>right</highlight> through into the forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我将它置于（镜头的）中央，以便取景时从前景直接穿入森林。

examination_example.sentence: The one for rent is on the <highlight>right</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 待出租的那个在右边。

sense_info_list.zh: 正当; 正义; 正确

word_usage.usage: 我们不说get sth. correct，而说get sth. right。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 好; 对; 对吗; 是吗
正好(用于强调精确的地点或时间)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 正确地；准确地；理所当然；公正地；正当地

word_family.mean: adj. 端正的；正当的；正义的；理所当然的；正确的；对的；准确的；右边的；右肢体的；右肢体穿戴的；十足的；绝对的；支持保守观点的；右翼的；右派的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 满意的；良好的；对；是的；好吧
在恰当的时间；在对的时间
右手；得力助手；右方；右面；右手上座；不可或缺的助手；最显赫的（尤指王室）家族分支；第二显赫的（尤指王室）家族分支

sense_info_list.en: following or in accordance with what is just, good, or proper

examination_example.sentence: Putting the effort in the <highlight>right</highlight> place is more important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把精力放在正确的地方更重要。

examination_example.sentence: Which is the <highlight>right</highlight> order (顺序) of the following events？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下列事件的正确顺序是哪一项？

examination_example.sentence: You are <highlight>right</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是对的。

examination_example.sentence: Zhang Jiacheng lost his <highlight>right</highlight> arm in an accident when he was 5.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 张嘉诚5岁时，在一次事故中失去了右臂。

examination_example.sentence: Turn <highlight>right</highlight>, and you can find the bookshop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 右转，你就可以找到书店。

examination_example.sentence: Boys and girls, please walk on the <highlight>right</highlight> side of the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们，请走公路的右边。

sense_info_list.zh: 好; 对; 对吗; 是吗

examination_example.sentence: All <highlight>right</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好吧。

examination_example.sentence: Mountain-climbing guides get to climb tall, dangerous mountains, <highlight>right</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 登山向导能爬上又高又险的山，对吗？

examination_example.sentence: Every flower has the <highlight>right</highlight> to show its beauty!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每一朵花都有权利展现它的美丽！

examination_example.sentence: Water is a human <highlight>right</highlight> and everyone should have their share.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 水是一项人权，每个人都应该有自己的一份。

examination_example.sentence: They often feel short-changed: the oldest gets more <highlight>rights</highlight>, and the youngest is spoiled (宠坏的).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们常常觉得自己受了亏待：最大的得到了更多的权利，而最小的被宠坏了。

sense_info_list.zh: 正好(用于强调精确的地点或时间)

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>right</highlight> then, I knew what to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在那时，我知道该怎么做了。

examination_example.sentence: Not long after that, the toothpaste tube (管子) was invented, so people could press the toothpaste <highlight>right</highlight> onto the toothbrush!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久之后，牙膏管子发明出来了，所以人们可以把牙膏直接挤到牙刷上！

examination_example.sentence: He poured out a line of flour <highlight>right</highlight> next to the king's line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在国王(画)的线旁边，倒出一排面粉。

examination_example.sentence: My mentor and I hit it off <highlight>right</highlight> away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和我的导师一见如故。

examination_example.sentence: Yukio has to leave <highlight>right</highlight> now because she is worried about her family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由纪夫不得不马上离开，因为她担心她的家人。

examination_example.sentence: I'll clean it <highlight>right</highlight> away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我马上打扫。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Right</highlight> about now, you might be thinking: it sounds great, but I'm not a good writer; or I'd love to keep a diary, but my handwriting is terrible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，你可能会想：这听起来不错，但我不是一个好作家； 或者我很想写日记，但我的字迹太糟了。

examination_example.sentence: The program is for 7, 000 students at 31 schools <highlight>right</highlight> now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目目前面向31所学校的7000名学生。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Right</highlight> now, Chinese buyers think China is good and 'Made in China' is not bad at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，中国购买者认为中国很好，“中国制造”一点也不差。

sense_info_list.en: suitable or correct, or as it should be

examination_example.sentence: It is easier to put off today's duties to tomorrow than to do them at the <highlight>right</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把今天的工作推到明天，要比在正确的时间去做来得容易。

examination_example.sentence: It will be the <highlight>right</highlight> time when you arrive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会来的正是时候的。

examination_example.sentence: But they didn't fit quite <highlight>right</highlight>, and there were gaps and rough (崎岖不平的) edges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但它们并不十分吻合，还有缝隙和崎岖不平的边缘。

examination_example.sentence: The teacher spoke so quickly that almost everything he said flew <highlight>right</highlight> over my head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师讲得太快了，几乎他说的每一句话我都听不懂。

examination_example.sentence: The handrail came <highlight>right</highlight> off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 扶手完全掉下来了。

word_usage.usage: 做某事是正确的，可用be right in doing sth.表达。如：我想我说这话没错。I think I'm right in saying this.
right与动词连用时，须放在动词之后；与其他副词连用时，须放在其他副词之前。
right作名词表示“右边”时，多用介词on或to。on the right强调空间位置，表示“在右边”；to the right强调方向，表示“向右边”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 使用广泛，可与这些词中的correct换用，但常暗示道德、理解、行动等方面的正确。
强调与事实、标准或实际情况相符合，而不是杜撰、虚构或捏造的。
最常用词，主要指按一定标准或规则来衡量，没有谬误和差错或无缺点错误。
